      • sumSubtract

        private Matrix sumSubtract(boolean isSum,
                           Matrix matr)
                    throws MatrixException
        Sums or subtracts matrices based on isSum
        Parameters:
        isSum - if true, it sums matrices, else subtracts from current the provided
        matr - matrix that will be summed|subtracted with
        Returns:
        result of operation
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if matrices have different sizes

      • sum

        public Matrix sum(Matrix matr)
           throws MatrixException
        Sums current matrix with provided and returns the result of operation

        Use sumSubtract(boolean isSum, Matrix matr) to sum matrices, isSum = true

        Parameters:
        matr - matrix will be sum with
        Returns:
        result of operation
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if matrices have different sizes

      • subtract

        public Matrix subtract(Matrix matr)
                throws MatrixException
        Subtracts current matrix with provided and returns the result of operation

        Use sumSubtract(boolean isSum, Matrix matr) to sum matrices, isSum = false

        Parameters:
        matr - matrix will be subtracted
        Returns:
        result of operation
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if matrices have different sizes

      • makeMultiplicationCellValue

        private int makeMultiplicationCellValue(int[] row,
                                        int[] column)
                                 throws MatrixException
        Calculates cell value for multiplication
        Parameters:
        row - row that will be multiplied
        column - column that will be multiplied
        Returns:
        result of multiplication
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if row and column have different lengths

      • multiply

        public Matrix multiply(Matrix matr)
                throws MatrixException
        Multiplies current matrix on provided one and returns the result of multiplication.

        Current and provided matrices are not touched

        Parameters:
        matr - matrix will be multiplied on
        Returns:
        result on operation
        Throws:
        MatrixException - if number of rows of the current matrix is not equal the number of columns of provided one and vice versa
